name: Thoroughbred Breeder: Sekai Seiha Hen
overview: Thoroughbred Breeder - Sekai Seiha Hen (The Conquest of the World) is a mix between a breeding game and a simulation game. The player can choose what horses he want to mix to give birth a new stallion that he will use to compete in the different races that are around Japan, Europe & United States. The new feature of the game is that the player can go to the horse market and make bids for trying to buy new horses for his ranch.
